monogr.title: A manual of controversies : wherin the Catholique Romane faith in all the cheefe pointes of controuersies of these daies is proued by holy Scripture. By A.C.S
monogr.author: Champney, Anthony

p.hi: I Haue courteous reader taken some paynes to put together this litle manual of controuersies, entending nor pretending anie other thing therby then thy profit: yf thou reape anie by it: my trauayle shalbe richly recompenced. Howsoeuer, in requitall of my good-will let me intreat this fauoure of the, that, if thou wilt dayne it the reading, thou wouldest doe yt with some attention, and such intention, as the subiect requireth: which howsoeuer, or by whomsoeuer it be handled, is of that weyght and moment, that may duly demaūd thy best, most setled, & sincerest thaughtes.

The insuing preface wil acquaynt thee both with the drift and motiue of this treatise, and also with those few pointes which I haue thaught worthie of remark concerning the same. Therfore haue I nothing more to trouble the with, but only to entreat thee to take some heede in decerning the Catholique Positiones, from those of the Protestantes, because they are not so euidently distinguished in character (especially before the page 76.) as they might haue beene: and also to pardon the faultes escaped in the print, but most of all those in the margent as most important. In the latter end of the booke they are all corected and therfore may more easely be born with. Farewell.

closer.signed: Thy freind as thou art a freind to truthe: howsoeuer thy well willer. A. C.
